name: Reliance Risk
overview:
Reliance Risk is a risk management company founded by current CEO Wayne Middleton. The website specializes in a unique risk management software capable of assessing and controlling business and event related risk, recording and analyzing incidents and benchmarking industry risks and incident statistics within an organization as well as against other relevant industry users.

The risk management software, known as “Risk Sense” was developed by the company to address a need in the venues, events and sporting industries where risk management is increasingly perceived as an operational compliance tool rather than for risk-based decision-making across a business. The software alleviates the need to apply human resources to assess event risk situations that may be time consuming and subjective.

Risk Sense by Reliance Risk is an online software platform and database. The software and data is hosted on a dedicated server with several levels of I.T security and database protection. The structure of the software allows user anonymity and protects their personal data.

Reliance Risk has a dedicated portfolio of well-known Australian clients including the Sydney Opera House, the National Rugby League (NRL), Tennis Australia and the University of Sydney.

Core areas of service include: Sports risk management, Event risk management, risk management for entertainment and venues.
